name: Depth Seeker - Mini Jam 108
description:
Developers:
  • Garreth Botha - lead programming, game design
  • Hayden Botha - art, game design
  • Nikheil Naidoo - programming, game design
Synopsis:

A terrible natural disaster has caused a flood. Scavengers have taken advantage of this, using submarines to infiltrate facilities and steal their resources. You are on a dangerous mission, and the newly installed security systems are now your biggest obstacle.

Goals:

Move your cursor around the submarine to orientate the cannon-thruster. The cannon-thruster will allow you to move (RMB) or shoot (LMB). There are obstacles that you must avoid. These obstacles can either attack you or kill you on impact. Some of these obstacles can be destroyed using your cannon (LMB). Resource crates can also be found. Destroying them will reveal resource capsules. You must attempt to get as deep into the facility as you can while collecting these resource capsules.

Controls:
  • Left mouse button (LMB) - Shoot
  • Right mouse button (RMB) - Move
Extra Assets:

Particles are from the Unity Particle Pack 5.x
